id: MashableLittle girl's headless Halloween costume is absolutely incredible
paragraph:
This little girl's Halloween costume comes with an extra level of spook.Â In Southbay Village, Philippines, a child named of Maya went trick-or-treating this weekend as a headless girl in a flower dress. She walked around carrying her "decapitated" head on a plate.Â It looks even creepier than it sounds.Â
